response.overview: Thalassa is an experimental film whose theme is shipwreck and what follows: psychological disorientation, the acceptance of death, the loss of ourselves, the collapse of our ideals and loneliness, but also survival and the burden of having to justify it to ourselves, embarking on the search for a truth we will never know. The sea and water an essential element for life, of which our body is made up of about seventy percent become in the film a symbolic reference, a timeless place that represents the passage from life to death.
response.title: Thalassa
